description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply, delivery, and install of a walk-in cooler and freezer system
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Walk-in Cooler and Freezer System**

## Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3815515473
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3815515473
* **Publication Date:** January 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 21, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

## Amendment Details

* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Amendment Date:** February 15, 2023

## Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 13, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 31, 2023
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Classification

* **UNSPSC Code:** 24131605
* **UNSPSC Description:** Walk-in freezers

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Fraser, Alexa (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, requires the supply, delivery, and installation of a walk-in cooler and freezer system. Amendment to closing time: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on February 21, 2023, by 2:00 PM EST.

Please note that bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be declared non-responsive. All bids will be submitted through the Ariba Discovery platform.
